bio:
Digimonk Solutions is an offshore software development and outsourcing company specializes in delivering customized services and solutions that cover the full application development life cycle, deployment and maintenance. 

Our technology expertise lies with native and cross platform mobile app development, Website and CMS development, eCommerce and other product development. We have highly skilled resource working with SwiftUI, Swift, Objective-C, Kotlin, Java, Flutter, Unity, PHP, Laravel, Reactjs, Nodejs, Nextjs, Vuejs, MySQL, Mongodb, Firebase and AWS services, ASP.NET, .NET core, .NET MVC, Angularjs etc. 

With in-depth knowledge and competence in software development, we help clients from different domain to achieve their business goals. Our aim is to go beyond client's expectations and as a technology partner, we take the responsibility for implementing the most creative and innovative ideas.

bio:
My goal is to compel your audience to act by communicating high-impact messages and visually engaging campaigns. Entities have entrusted me with crafting an effective, compelling presence in the market that help them remain competitive and successful.

As a passionate designer, I create solutions that have a high visual impact. I am a well-rounded, creative print and digital designer.

I have substantial experience designing Logos, Packaging, labels, Branding, infographics brochures, catalogs, posters, flyers, print ads, websites, and much more. The essence of my competency lies in complete and fast branding, and I am seeking the opportunity to work with your brand and be part of the chain that helps your business to grow.

I have excellent communication skills and excel at being a team player. I am self-motivated, take ownership and responsibility of my work, and work efficiently and effectively within time and budget constraints.

I believe unique concepts and strategic ideas are the foundation of great design and I love finding creative new ways to present information to a user. I always do extensive research at the beginning of each new project to make sure I can offer the best solution for you and your target market. In addition, My completed artwork is print or upload ready to client specifications.

What I focus on:
✦ Logo Design

abstrac: Computer musician - Note-for-note music transcription and engraving services.
bio:
I offer you my experience of 40 years as Academic/Pop Musician (any genre), Guitarist and Keyboardist, with vast expertise in audio, MIDI, and music software.

Hablo Español, así que también me puedes contactar directamente en este idioma.

I work with the following music notation software:

- Sibelius
- Finale
- Encore
- LilyPond
- MuseScore

I work with the following multitrack Audio/MIDI software:

- Cakewalk Sonar
- Reaper

I offer the following music services:

1.- Align your music to the metronome.
2.- Transcribe the bass line of any song.
3.- Transcribe the melody or a melodic instrumental part of any song.
4.- Transcribe the chords of any song.
5.- Remove background noise from your audio files.
6.- Vocal tuning with Melodyne.
7.- Remove unwanted sections from audio.
8.- Make a short or long version of any song.
9.- Even out volume levels of speakers on Podcasts, Radio pograms.
10.- Mix your audio files into a medley.
11.- Convert your MIDI files to sheet music.
12.- Convert your handwritten music into professional sheet music.
13.- Convert your handwritten or printed sheet music to MIDI Files.
14.- Change the tempo or BPM of an audio file.
15.- Change the key or transpose your audio file.
16.- Transcribe any fingerstyle Ukulele song to Tabs.
17.- Transpose sheet music to another key.
18.- Convert YouTube video music files to mp3 or wav.

Hours of operation: Monday through Friday - 8:00 am to 8:00 pm
Payment terms: Please check the services for payment terms.
Preferred communication style: Through Guru's messaging system. Can be in English or Spanish.

abstrac: If you can imagine it, I can do it
bio:
Who am I?
My name is Marek Janda, I was born in Slovakia and I live in London. I have a Master's degree in Mechanical engineering, precisely in Thermal Power Engineering Machinery and Equipment, and I have a passion for technology and football. I have a Computer Science for Web Programming Professional certificate from Harvard University Edx program and I have been working as heat pump control logic development engineer. Throughout my professional career I have written various algorithms for design optimization and data processing.

Why me?
My engineering background helps me to connect multiple technologies into one. It allows me to have a deeper understanding of a problem and to create a unique application.

What do I offer?
Back end and front end web application development using Python and JavaScript.
A unique custom styled web applications with HTML and CSS.
Efficient database systems and much more according your requirements and imagination.
Optimize and data processing algorithms
